articles.content: This is a comprehensive guide to getting started with API development. We'll cover the basics of REST APIs, authentication, and best practices.

articles.title: Understanding RESTful Services
articles.content: RESTful services are a cornerstone of modern web development. Learn how to design and implement REST APIs that are scalable and maintainable.

articles.title: Best Practices for API Security
articles.content: Security is crucial when building APIs. This article covers authentication, authorization, rate limiting, and other security best practices.

articles.title: API Documentation Standards
articles.content: Good documentation is essential for API adoption. Learn about OpenAPI, Swagger, and other documentation tools that make your API accessible to developers.

articles.title: Error Handling in APIs
articles.content: Proper error handling improves developer experience and makes debugging easier. This guide covers HTTP status codes, error response formats, and best practices.
